content: Explore the neural network nebula by clicking the nodes
If the start nn button is pressed a simple mnist neural network will begin training using Tensorflowjs, this will likely slow down the page for 10-30 seconds.
Fun Facts: Subject's name translates to Adam Driver in English aka Kylo Ren
The word robot was first used in a Czech play from 1921
Education: BS in Computer Science from the University of Florida
Currently pursuing a master's in AI at Boston University
Competitions / Hackathons: The subject has been known to compete and placed.

Math Modeling Competitions:

  • SCUDEM
  • Wordle ICM/MCM
  • Submarine ICM/MCM

Hackathons:

  • UF AI Days
  • Georgia Tech Robothon
  • UF IoT Club
Clubs: The subject has been known to engage with both academic and recreational clubs

Recreations:

  • UF Kickboxing Club
  • UF Judo Club
  • UF OAR Club
Future Work / Interests: Admitted to Boston University's AI masters program where I would like to concentrate on machine vision and tinyML
Projects: Currently working on refactoring the Nagamasou game using the esp-idf to have on-board ML while keeping all current functionality.
Thank you for exploring the neural network nebula!
Please rate my website from 0-9 by drawing a number on the canvas:
